name: tor-mooks-state-checker.js
description: This script will change the weary state automatically on mooks when hate hits 0,and if you then also set up your mook's macros to roll against [@{selected|bar3}] and you've set up your Rollable Tables in accordance with this page: https://wiki.roll20.net/The_One_Ring, you can have your macros automatically roll on the right table, etc.
authors: Michael Heilemann, Stefan Unterhuber, Stuart Johnson, David Dom√≠nguez, Eric Le Bourvellec, Michael (aka Aragent) I
